work.title: Software Engineer Intern, FaceSec Singapore
description: Designed UI for Admin and Client Consoles with Figma
Developed full-stack web application on React, Vue, and SpringBoot
Configure automated integration and validation of changes through GitLab CI/CD
Manage dockerized micro-service applications on AWS

competitions.title: LifeHack 2021, NUS
description: To assist in the transition into a post-pandamic era, develop a viable solution to encourage more face-to-face interaction
Created an proximity based match-making mobile app with google map API for users to have meals together
Users are able to selected a eatery on the map within the app
Users who select the same location would be matched and begin arrangement of meal through real-time messaging feature

competitions.title: CodeFiesta 2021, GovTech
description: The strict travel control during pandamic has let to information scattering and constant change of required processes for travel, provide a solution to reduce pain points of travellers
Made use of design thinking process and interview affected travellers
Develop a integrated webapp where information could be easily accessed and updated with minimal delay by collaborating with government bodies

competitions.title: IdeasJam2021, NTU
description: To increase local vegetable Production, develop a SMART solution to make urban farming more accessible and efficient in Singapore
Developed a webapp to monitor and collect sensor readings from hydroponics
Use machine learning on sensor readings to predict optimal condition for plant growth
Automate growing condition in the green house to minimise plant growth defects

competitions.title: Shopee Code League 2021
description: Competed against teams within Southeast Asia to solve problems in the categories of Data Analytics, Data Science and Data Structures and Algorithms.

competitions.title: BrainHack CDDC CTF 2021, DSTA
description: Joined a CTF the first time to have learn about vulnerabilities and tools used for exploitation
